description: A day full of exciting sports and activities.

details.longDescription: The Annual Sports Day will feature track events, team sports, and fun games for students, parents, and teachers. Trophies and medals will be awarded to the winners.
details.fullLocation: ABC School, Main Sports Ground, Karachi

description: Showcasing innovative student projects and experiments.

details.longDescription: The Science Exhibition is an opportunity for students to display their innovative projects and experiments. The event will feature guest lectures and hands-on activities for attendees.

description: Celebrating creativity with art and musical performances.

details.longDescription: The Art and Music Festival will feature an art gallery showcasing student work, along with musical performances by the school band and choir. A fun-filled event for art and music enthusiasts.
details.fullTitle: ABC School Art and Music Festival 2024

details.longDescription: Parents are invited to discuss their child's progress and performance with teachers. An opportunity to strengthen the school-home partnership.

description: Honoring our graduates for their achievements.

details.longDescription: The Graduation Ceremony is a formal event to honor our graduates for their hard work and achievements. Join us to celebrate this important milestone in their lives.
